climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 👉 [ LUXURY FABRICS ] - The skin-friendly soft cover is made of 100% Microfiber fabric material, Nice sleeping pillow in your life. It is highly recommended as a good gift for your parents, family and friends.

👉 [ MATERIAL OF FILLING ] - Pillow core made of down-like microfiber , This pillow certified by premium CertiPUR-US & GREENGUARD Gold, No Odor peculiar smell and No irritation, The perfect balance between fluffy and support to provide the which makes the pillows supportive and cozy.

👉 [ PROVIDE EXCELLENT SUPPORT ] - These set of 2 pillows are made with a great balance of supple softness and plump firmness, providing adequate support to your head, neck and shoulders, So it can keep your head will not sink right down to the mattress.

👉 [ SOFT AND FLUFFY ] - Whether you are a side sleeper, or back sleeper, and even some stomach sleeper. These pillows have a high loft, Great for all sleeping styles , They will give you great support for your neck and shoulder, Comfortable and cooling pillow.

👉 [ AFTER SALES POLICY ] - We believe in our products so much, We also provide the best experience to customer, that you can buy with confidence, If Your Sleeping Experience with this Fluffy Bed Pillow is not Absolutely Exceptional, Simply Contact Us for fully refund.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Sleep well / Sweet dreams! Our bedding is just for giving you a comfortable deep sleep.Pillows allows you with your family ,friends, enjoy the happy moments, Get a good night’s rest with the HIMOON Alternative Breathable Bed Pillows.

Sleep Like a Baby A suitable pillow can adjust your sleep posture and improve your sleep quality. After a busy day of work and study, you will be able to relax and enjoy life.WHY CHOOSE OUR PILLOWS?Filling is full and High-elastic, fluffy, Firm, soft and comfortable.Protect the spine when sleep.Our bed pillows are 100% Polyester + Microfiber filled.Sweat absorbing and breathable.Great support, not easy to be deformed.Skin-friendly cover to keep you comfortable and cool as you sleep.Balanced softness with support.Exquisite design gives the pillows a luxurious look.Without any odor making you feel like sleeping on a cloud.TIPS:It's Packaged in a Vacuum Bag, Please spread It for a Few Days Before Use So It Would Return to Normal Thickness.Good Way Fluffy Again: Lay It in the Sun for a Few Hours.

Pillows that stay soft & breathable & dry Without any odor making you feel like sleeping on a cloud. It offer great support for head and neck so it can keep your head will not sink right down to the mattress. Adjust the Correct Sleeping Posture The Pillow provides proper neck alignment and support, It give you the comfort you need for a long-lasting, good night sleep. Pillows are supportive enough to keeping the body aligned for back, stomach and side sleepers. Great for everyone This pillow offers softness, comfort and support for all one, The entire family can enjoy for a better night’s rest.

Please use the following steps to make the pillow fluffy: 1. Opening the plastic wrap, they have a good fluff;2. Please unwrap and fluff it up manually to its full size by kneading/slapping and shaking. Please give 48-72 hours to the pillow to fully expand.Friendly ReminderPillows become fluffy when you dry them (DO NOT BLEACH OR IRON).By placing the pillows in the sun for a few hours on a bright day will evaporate the moisture that builds up overnight, and the pillows will fluff up over the day and to make sure your pillows become fluffier and softer. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a great find!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this morning and received by dinner time! The best is how amazing the pillows are for such a great price! Quality materials and well made. Comfy without being too soft or firm. Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Best pillows ever! After doing a ton of research and reading reviews, I decided to purchase these pillows based on other peoples reviews. Their memory foam Super lightweight and fluffy. Other memory pillows that are pretty firm and not as comfortable as these. They come air sealed and rolled up really small, so I was worried about how thin they were gonna be once I open them up and let them sit out for about 15 minutes. They are super full perfect size and exceeded any expectations. If you’re looking for a quality pillows that support your neck if your side sleeper this is the perfect pillow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality, good price for a firm pillow
reviews.reviewText: The pillow is well made and attractive. It provides very good support, but is a little firmer than I like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are great pillows for a great sleep that come at a cheap price. It's a great pillow, that's soft and comfy and doesnt hurt your neck in the morning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice but not as soft as others I’ve had
reviews.reviewText: Very nice but not as soft as others I’ve had Very heavy, kinda thick. Not my favorite but it’s fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Soft but thin
reviews.reviewText: These pillows are very soft. That being said, they are perhaps too soft. The offer no support, and tend to wrap around your head when you lie on them. They're thin and barely have any shape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars truly amazing product
reviews.reviewText: I love these pillows because they're very soft and support my neck while sleeping. It is also remarkable that instead of just one pillow by itself, it comes with two pillows for great value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These Pillows Are Great!
reviews.reviewText: I was not too sure about these pillows when they arrived because they were rolled tightly and I was about to send them back. I am so glad that I didn't. I unwrapped them and lightly fluffed them and they hotel pillow quality. We love them and I plan to order another set in a few days. The price is great and the quality is out of this world.

Very soft. I made two dreamy pillows out of one pillow. The original was too high, but stretched between two cases, these are perfect. No more neck pain. Soft on the face. I used zip laundry bags as new casings and toss the whole thing in the laundry to keep clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Too low - not good for side sleepers
reviews.reviewText: Too low - not good for side sleepers
It has worked well but did not offer the type of long term support that I was looking for.
